structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Property Tax Assessment Of Land Under Agricultural Preservation Restrictions
law.text: Land under agricultural preservation restrictions, while actively devoted to agricultural, horticultural or agricultural and horticultural use as defined in sections 1 to 5, inclusive, of chapter 61A, shall be assessed for general property tax purposes at values no greater than those determined by the methods and provisions of section 10 of said chapter 61A.
